column1: Abu ʽArish (أبو عريش) is a city in Jizan Province
column3: Abu ʽArish well known of its farms and pure water. Abu ʽArish is located at the heart of the region. Due to its location it is the commercial center of the region. Most of brands are there. Fast food restaurants such as McDonald's
column5: and Hardee's are there. The majority of the people of the city are well educated and open to others.
